positions.title: Web Developer and Team Facilitator
responsibilities: Facilitated a team of 9 developers and software testers
Provided architectural guidance to other developers

Implemented and maintained multiple payment platforms, including: two credit card gateways; an interface to American Express' CAS and CAPN systems; and interfaces to Google Wallet, PayPal, and Bill Me Later
Developed a system to automatically compute refunds and cancellation penalties
Added support for multi-level encryption of sensitive credit card information
Added white label product for affiliates to customize the look and feel of the website
Developed multiple internal tools, including an implementation of PHP_CodeSniffer

positions.title: Operations Accountant III
responsibilities: Supervised a program to recover revenue from insufficient funds transactions, including acceptance of payments and escalation of unpaid violations
Prepared monthly reconciliations of cash funds and deposit accounts
Assisted in development of new financial and operation reports, including writing business requirements and reviewing result sets
Reviewed monthly and quarterly traffic and revenue reports to ensure accuracy of data
Assisted with training presentations for the Chief Financial Office and senior accounting staff, including the development of training documents

positions.title: Internal Audit Intern
responsibilities: Tested various internal controls as part of a Sarbanes-Oxley compliance program
Traveled to airport stations throughout the company's system for field audits to ensure compliance with company policies

volunteer.company: Orlando 2018 - Bid to Bring the Gay Games to Orlando

positions.title: Director of Technology
responsibilities: Created the Information Systems Plan portion of the organization's bid to host Gay Games X in 2018
